items.name: 对文章进行收藏或者取消收藏

api.description: Allows a user to collect an item (e.g., an article or post).

query.name: Type
query.description: 1:请求一级评论 2：请求二级评论

items.name: 对文章进行点赞或者踩

api.description: Allows a user to favorite an article.

items.name: 对评论进行点赞或者踩

api.description: Allows a user to comment on a favorite item.
用户可以通过此接口删除一篇文章
用户可以通过此接口修改一篇文章
用户可以通过此接口发表一篇文章

responses.name: 成功
responses.description: 成功响应，返回文章详情

api.description: 用户可以通过此接口获取某篇文章的详细信息

query.name: UHashID
query.description: 如果id为0，则根据时间的先后去请求文章列表

responses.name: 成功

parameters.name: file_type
parameters.description: 上传的类型，是头像还是背景图片

schema.description: 上传的类型，是头像还是背景图片

api.description: 用户可以通过该接口上传文件
测试服务器连接

ChildNum.description: 该评论被回复的数量，当为一级评论时候，显示数量，二级的时候，显示为0

FavoriteCount.description: 该评论获得的点赞数量

RepliedUHashId.description: 如果该评论为某评论的回复，则该字段为被回复的用户的hashID

comment_count.description: total number of comments on the video

like_count.description: total number of likes for the video

follow_count.description: total number of people the user follows

is_follow.description: whether the currently logged-in user follows this user

total_favorited.description: number of articles for articles published by user

work_count.description: number of articles published by user

background_image.description: image at the top of the user's personal page
